transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se kaise ho aap?
Customer: Badhiya boliye.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan, maine uska abhi mujhe kuch update nahi aaya hai. Maine internal ticket raise kar diya hamare yahan se apne yahan se, theek hai? Hello review rating wala sir, haan?
Executive: Hello
Customer: Aur jaise update aayega, jaise update aayega sir main isko aapko update kar dunga if hamari company hamari team allow karegi isko, matlab wo kar payegi har ek cheez proof mangegi to kar degi otherwise jo aap bolenge wo kar denge.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan to wo aapne bheja nahi hai kya wo aage review aapne karwa do na review to aage do five star rating.
Executive: Sir dekho review aise se agar supported theek hai aise review aap aise dilwane se koi benefit nahi hoga sir aur hume authorities nahi hoti ki hum apne taraf se khud ka review de de na khud se de de aapki profile pe hum kuch nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Chhodo chhodo chhodo kuch nahi hona review nahi de sakte na sir hum.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi kuch nahi hoga.
Executive: Guide kar sakte hain kaise review ho de sakte ho na sir.
Customer: Are koi dikkat nahi bhaiya na aapne catalog karni hai na aapne review ka dekhna hai na kuch karna hai.
Executive: Catalog ka nahi sir nahi review ka account manager pata nahi kaise sambhal rahe ho aap.
Customer: Nahi sir main guide har ek cheez kar sakta hun aur ye remove aur rating ka abhi tak mere paas wo cheeze nahi aaya hai main apne taraf se nahi de sakta.
Executive: To hamari kya baat hui thi sir aapne kya bola tha link bhej dena main aage karwa dunga ab aaj keh rahe ho ki main hum nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Link main wo sari cheeze maine apne team se baat kar liya hai sir uske liye.
Executive: Are wo personal wo aap personal way mein kar rahe ho officially kar rahe ho?
Customer: Official kar raha hun sir har ek cheez baat kar raha hun personal review review jo link link jo link jo sir main review jo hamare kar dena.
Customer: Haan jo mere dost yaar honge main unse karwa sakta hun sir main theek hai do teen log se haan aapki products pe agar wo product mein interested honge main karwa sakta hun ye cheeze ye sari cheeze ya review ka bhi aap bol do nahi ho payega to wo bhi main hi kar lunga fir catalog jaise main karwa raha hun na waise.
Executive: Review ka bhi main hi kar lunga fir.
Customer: Jitna jitna soch sakega utna karwaunga to us hisab se lekin aap aap ye jo agar support hai kya mere liye ye batao aapne abhi tak kya karwaya mere liye ye batao kuch to karwaya nahi hai IndiaMART ke through meri kya help kar di aapne?
Executive: Na aapne catalog sudhari hai na aapne review ka kuch kiya hai kuch bhi nahi kiya aapne.
Customer: Theek hai ek baar fir se jaise mere paas update aata hai iska main aapko update kar deta hun theek hai main fir ek baar dal deta hun high team kindly update.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Update aayega so aayega main to review badhane ki baat kar raha hun na bhaiya agar aap five star rating doge mera 4.1 star hai thoda badhega to sahi star rating review hoga mera.
Executive: Wo to theek hai sir main ek baar dekh leta hun fir se review rating ka theek hai jo bhi cheeze hoga main aapko one by one update kar dunga agar wo bhi aapse nahi ho raha to wo message dal do wo bhi nahi ho raha aapse to fir baat hi alag hai fir main koi matlab nahi hai sir hai na aap mere ko wo bhi dal do nahi karwaunga to koi baat alag hai.
Customer: Ji sir aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Sari cheeze karenge kuch kaam to karwa nahi rahe ho sir aisa nahi hai to fir kaam to karwao aap mera kuch karwa to rahe nahi ho.
Customer: Aapne mere ko ye update dene ke liye phone kiya hai kya?
Executive: Dekho to aap ye cheeze maine aap bol rahe hain sir hum mere taraf se abhi hamari internal team se koi update nahi aaya hai ho sakta hai wo work kar rahi ho tab bhi aapko update dena jaruri hota hai sir jo jiske liye update nahi aaya wo to chalo theek hai aaj nahi aaya kal aa jayega main logo se bol raha hun usko to kar lo aap.
Customer: Do teen logo se bola bhi hun ki sir in sir ki profile pe review de do.
Executive: Theek hai wo unhone dekha review diya ya nahi diya ye cheeze maine check nahi kiya hai na un do teen logo se main bol diya hun ki sir ki profile pe jao dekh lo is review de do wahan se na do teen nahi char panch main aapko whatsapp pe wo bhi de do.
Customer: Aise thodi na hota hai aisa kaun dega review koi nahi dega aise review.
Executive: Fir to main aap bataiye aap bataiye kaise de do sir aap.
Customer: Nahi hume authorities nahi hoti hum de de review na IndiaMART ka employee kabhi nahi deta hai sir review na.
Executive: Are chhodo kuch nahi hona aapse.
Executive: Iska
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received review rating update.

- Wants help to improve catalog and reviews.

- Feels IndiaMART has not helped him.



Resolution:

- Executive will check on review rating update.

- Executive will update customer one by one.

- Executive mentioned internal team working on it.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- review, rating, catalog, update, support
